trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum width for a ToolTip window

target.mrk: Sets the maximum width for a ToolTip window

target.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

trans-unit.source: Maximum ToolTip window width to be set (in pixels)

seg-source.mrk: Maximum ToolTip window width to be set (in pixels)

target.mrk: Maximum ToolTip window width to be set (in pixels)

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: Returns the previous maximum ToolTip width in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the previous maximum ToolTip width in pixels.

target.mrk: Returns the previous maximum ToolTip width in pixels.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: The maximum ToolTip width value does not indicate a ToolTip window's actual width.

seg-source.mrk: The maximum ToolTip width value does not indicate a ToolTip window's actual width.

target.mrk: The maximum ToolTip width value does not indicate a ToolTip window's actual width.

trans-unit.source: Rather, if a ToolTip string exceeds the maximum width, the control breaks the text into multiple lines, using spaces to determine line breaks.

seg-source.mrk: Rather, if a ToolTip string exceeds the maximum width, the control breaks the text into multiple lines, using spaces to determine line breaks.

target.mrk: Rather, if a ToolTip string exceeds the maximum width, the control breaks the text into multiple lines, using spaces to determine line breaks.

trans-unit.source: If the text cannot be segmented into multiple lines, it will be displayed on a single line.

seg-source.mrk: If the text cannot be segmented into multiple lines, it will be displayed on a single line.

target.mrk: If the text cannot be segmented into multiple lines, it will be displayed on a single line.

trans-unit.source: The length of this line may exceed the maximum ToolTip width.

seg-source.mrk: The length of this line may exceed the maximum ToolTip width.

target.mrk: The length of this line may exceed the maximum ToolTip width.

trans-unit.source: A ToolTip control needs this setting if you want to have a multi-line ToolTip. Without this setting, if you put a line break (@CR, @LF, @CRLF) in the text of a tool, the text will be truncated at that line break.

seg-source.mrk: A ToolTip control needs this setting if you want to have a multi-line ToolTip.
Without this setting, if you put a line break (@CR, @LF, @CRLF) in the text of a tool, the text will be truncated at that line break.

target.mrk: A ToolTip control needs this setting if you want to have a multi-line ToolTip.
Without this setting, if you put a line break (@CR, @LF, @CRLF) in the text of a tool, the text will be truncated at that line break.

trans-unit.source: Add a multi-line tool to the ToolTip control using @CRLF to break the text into 2 lines

target.mrk: Add a multi-line tool to the ToolTip control using @CRLF to break the text into 2 lines

trans-unit.source: If the text exceeds the width, then it carries over to the next line.

seg-source.mrk: If the text exceeds the width, then it carries over to the next line.

target.mrk: If the text exceeds the width, then it carries over to the next line.

trans-unit.source: Also allows you to use @CRLF

target.mrk: Also allows you to use @CRLF

target.mrk: Add a multi-line tool to the ToolTip control using the MaxTipWidth setting to break the text into 2 lines.

trans-unit.source: If the text exceeds the width, then it carries over to the next line. Also allows you to use @CRLF
